doc.name: printPaperScale
doc.summary: Reports the scaling factor to be applied to a printed page.

examples.example: set the printPaperScale to the label of button "Scale" of group "Print Settings"

description.p: Use the printPaperScale property to apply a final scaling factor to a printed page after all other settings have been taken into account.
The printPaperScale is a number greater than 0, it does not have to be a whole number. The default value is 1.
To have an effect, this property must be set before calling open printing.
